historial_registro.titulo: History of accreditation records and high quality of the Academic Project
historial_registro.explicacacion: This Module allows you to consult the history of qualified and high quality records of an existing academic project at the District University.
historial_registro.registro_titulo: Create a Record to an Existing Project
historial_registro.seguro_continuar_registrar: Are you sure you register a new record for this academic project?
historial_registro.crear_registro: Create new registration to the Academic Project

proyecto.acto: Administrative act through which the academic project is created by the Higher University Council
proyecto.erro_codigo: Please enter the project code, it must contain 3 digits and numbers only.
proyecto.erro_correo: Please enter the Project Mail and the indicated format.
proyecto.erro_creditos: Please enter the Project Credits, maximum 4 digits and only numbers.
proyecto.erro_duracion: Please enter the Duration of the project, maximum 3 digits and only numbers.
proyecto.erro_unidad: Please select the unit of time.
proyecto.erro_fecha_creacion: Please complete the date and time of the record creation
proyecto.erro_fecha_vigencia: Please complete the date and time of the registration period
proyecto.erro_selec_nucleo: Please select the Core Knowledge Base!
proyecto.erro_nivel: Please select the level of training!
proyecto.erro_reso: Please enter the resolution, only number and maximum 4 digits!!
proyecto.erro_ano: Please enter the resolution year, only number and maximum 4 digits!
proyecto.erro_acto: Please enter the administrative act number!
proyecto.erro_ano_acto: Please enter the year of the administrative act!
proyecto.erro_titu_mujer: Please enter the degree awarded to a Woman!
proyecto.erro_titu_hombre: Please enter the degree awarded to a Man!
proyecto.seguro_continuar_registrar_proyecto: Are you sure you register this academic project?
proyecto.mensaje: This Module allows you to register a new academic project or create one from an academic project that has similar characteristics, in order to perform the registration you must have the evidence of the administrative act at hand, please enter the requested information.
proyecto.erro_mes_vigencia: Please enter the number of months, maximum number allowed 12!
proyecto.erro_ano_vigencia: Please enter the number of years, maximum number allowed 9!.
proyecto.mensaje_oikos: Please relate the curricular project with the physical space of the OIKOS system, if the physical space does not exist, please notify the system administrator

ERROR.general: The request could not be satisfied
ERROR.401: Authorization is not possible, has failed or has not yet been provided
ERROR.403: The server refuses to respond because the client does not have the appropriate privileges
ERROR.405: The request was made using an unsupported application method
ERROR.408: You have exceeded the time limit in returning answer
ERROR.409: The request could not be processed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource
ERROR.formato_documento_pdf: The format of the chosen file is not pdf
ERROR.error_subir_documento: An error ocurred uploading the documents, please try again.
ERROR.error_cargar_documento: An error ocurred downloading the documents, please try again.
ERROR.rol_insuficiente_titulo: The user does not have permissions
ERROR.rol_insuficiente: The user does not have sufficient permissions to use the system .
ERROR.fallo_informacion_en: There was an error querying the information about
ERROR.sin_informacion_en: No information has been found about
ERROR.persiste_error_comunique_OAS: Please return and try again later. If the error persists, contact the Technology and Information Advisory Office (Oficina Asesora de Tecnologías e Información)
ERROR.error_previsualizar_doc: The document could not be viewed, it is not a valid format, or it was not found.

consultaproyecto.explicacacion: This Module allows you to consult an existing academic project at the District University, in the same way, it allows you to make a simple or complete modification of a curricular project, you can also register an academic project from a similar project will allow you to disable an academic project , please enter the requested information.
consultaproyecto.titulo_consulta: Basic Information of the Academic Project
consultaproyecto.seguro_continuar_actualizar_proyecto: Are you sure you want to update this academic project?
consultaproyecto.seguro_continuar_inhabilitar_proyecto: Are you sure you want to disable this academic project?
consultaproyecto.seguro_continuar_habilitar_proyecto: Are you sure you want to enable this academic project?

editarproyecto.seguro_continuar_actualizar_proyecto: Are you sure you update this academic project?
editarproyecto.erro_fecha_creacion: Please complete the date and time of the coordinator's assignment
editarproyecto.seguro_continuar_asignar: Are you sure you assign this coordinator to this academic project?
